name: scramjet-csi-dev
description: A development repo for Scramjet CSI, a container supervisor that allows deployment, execution and monitoring of any application based on a simple interface.

scripts.build:all: yarn build:packages && yarn build:refapps && yarn build:docker
scripts.build:all-packages: LOCAL_PACKAGES=true lerna run build && LOCAL_PACKAGES=true lerna run build:refapps
scripts.pack:pub: yarn clean:root && FLAT_PACKAGES=true MAKE_PUBLIC=true NO_INSTALL=true lerna run prepack
scripts.install:clean: yarn clean && yarn clean:modules && yarn install
scripts.bump:packages: CURR_VER=$(jq -r .version < package.json) && yarn version --new-version $(npx semver -i prerelease ${CURR_VER})
scripts.prebump:packages: git diff --exit-code --quiet && yarn bump:images && lerna version -y --no-git-tag-version $(npx semver -i prerelease $(jq -r .version < package.json)) && git add .
scripts.bump:postversion: yarn pack:pub && yarn publish:dist && git push --follow-tags
scripts.update-aaa: node scripts/make-aaa-package.js && yarn --cwd=./aaa install && yarn --cwd=./aaa upgrade -L --caret
scripts.upgrade:all: yarn update-aaa && yarn align && yarn install

author: Scramjet <open-source@scramjet.org>
